titleStmt.title: Mr. Pilkinton his Parallela disparalled And the Catholicke Roman faith maintained against Protestantisme. By Ant. Champney Sorbonist, and author of the Manuall of Controuersies, impugned by the said Mr. Pilkinton.
titleStmt.author: Champney, Anthony, 1569?-1643?

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Pilkington, Richard. Parallela.
Running title reads: Mr. Pilkintons Parallel disparalleld.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
